alert.note: Alert for Hinds; Warren (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 08 at 8:48PM CDT until further notice by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Big Black River Near Bentonia affecting Madison and Yazoo Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Big Black River At West affecting Attala and Holmes Counties. Big Black River Near Bovina affecting Warren and Hinds Counties. For the Big Black/Homochitto...including West, Bentonia, Bovina, Rosetta...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Black River Near Bovina. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 24.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 28.5 feet Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 28.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Big Black River Bovina 28.0 24.0 Sat 8 pm CDT 25.5 27.0 28.3 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Sunday morning at 900 AM CDT.
